lines.text: Or changes amount of force or torque
Ratio of work output to input

secText:
Lesson:
1. Define and explore examples of [OBJ:expsec_i979:simple machines].
2. Define and calculate [OBJ:expsec_i980:mechanical advantage].
3. Determine the effect of [OBJ:expsec_i981:work on a machine].
4. Define and calculate the [OBJ:expsec_i982:efficiency of machines].
